eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Colorado; Idaho; Montana; New Mexico; Utah; Wyoming; AT 10:00 AM ON OCT 27, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:00 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
